field.value: Clientside validation for date and regular expressions

field.name: description
field.value:
Client side validation for date field and regular expression. Localized date validation to follow soon. Give error message on ValidationAttribute precedence over default message.
Only updated the FormHelper.resx and not the AjaxHelper.resx because I extented a previous commit (revision 3647) that did the same.
Made difference between date en date-time validation
